Html:
Hi,

 

I'm trying to display a number of clients + leads on a map.  I currently have around 600 markers to plot on the map, but when I get to about 100, it grinds to a halt a bit :)

Is there any implementation, or suggestions on how to implement a cluster of markers?

Thanks,

 

Owen
you mean when on single point there is many markers?

Hi Radioman,
